channel.title: CVE Feed for cyberlord92 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cyberlord92 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-4943|2024-09-16T18:14:57.040Z -- cyberlord92 -- miniorange%26%23039%3Bs%20google%20authenticator%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20two%20factor%20authentication%20%E2%80%93%202fa%20%2C%20two%20factor%2C%20otp%20sms%20and%20email%20%7C%20passwordless%20login
item.description: The miniOrange's Google Authenticator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass due to a missing capability check when changing plugin settings in versions up to, and including, 5.6.5. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change the plugin's settings.

item.title: CVE-2022-4539|2024-09-03T14:37:17.494Z -- cyberlord92 -- web%20application%20firewall%20%E2%80%93%20website%20security
item.description: The Web Application Firewall plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to IP Address Spoofing in versions up to, and including, 2.1.2. This is due to insufficient restrictions on where the IP Address information is being retrieved for request logging and login restrictions. Attackers can supply the X-Forwarded-For header with with a different IP Address that will be logged and can be used to bypass settings that may have blocked out an IP address or country from logging in.

item.title: CVE-2022-4539|2024-08-31T09:35:55.748Z -- cyberlord92 -- web%20application%20firewall%20%E2%80%93%20website%20security
item.description: The Web Application Firewall plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to IP Address Spoofing in versions up to, and including, 2.1.2. This is due to insufficient restrictions on where the IP Address information is being retrieved for request logging and login restrictions. Attackers can supply the X-Forwarded-For header with with a different IP Address that will be logged and can be used to bypass settings that may have blocked out an IP address or country from logging in.
